Class GroupPage

java.lang.Object
GroupPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class GroupPage extends Object implements ActionListener
GroupPage class has all information and methods could be used in group pages.
Author:
Emirhan Cakir

  • Constructor Details

    • GroupPage

      public GroupPage(Group selectedGroup)
      This constructor takes Group object to build group page. It removes potential panels with build() method, then initialize pane to holds elements of the group.
      Parameters:
      selectedGroup - - selectedGroup parameter indicates which group is wanted to open.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      ActionPerformed method is coded to manage button reactions.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener

    • addGroupElements

      private JPanel addGroupElements()
      It initialize panel to elements. Then add firstly buttons and information of groups. After that contents which is shared in this group placed onto panel. JScrollPane uses this method generally.
      Returns:
      groupPane - groupPane holds all buttons,labels,fields will be used Panel

    • build

      private void build()
      The method removes all panel to prepare frame to add new panel.

    • getGroupScrollPane

      public static JScrollPane getGroupScrollPane()

    • removeAllMembers

      private void removeAllMembers()

    • openeditPage

      private void openeditPage(Content content)
      The method creates new frame to edit selected content. Selected content indicates via content paramaters.
      Parameters:
      content - - content is a Content which indicates which content is wanted to edit.

    • editContents

      private void editContents()
      It takes all contents in group.Show by title and give ability to edit

    • openSettings

      private void openSettings()
      The method initialize a frame to put all setting options. It puts button to check reactions of the user.

    • openEditGroupPage

      private void openEditGroupPage()
      It creates new frame to edit group. Before that close frames to make easier to use program for user.
